alert.note: Alert for NW Blount; North Sevier; Northwest Carter; Northwest Cocke; Northwest Greene; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 12 at 8:59AM CST until January 12 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of east Tennessee. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 7 AM this morning to 7 PM EST this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: NW Blount; North Sevier; Northwest Carter; Northwest Cocke; Northwest Greene; Washington
